name: Carmine Finance
description: <100 to 500 characters description of your project>

contracts.name: <Name of Mainnet contract 1 (remove entry in array if it doesn't apply, add more entries if there are more contracts)>
<Name of Mainnet contract 2 (remove entry in array if it doesn't apply, add more entries if there are more contracts)>

goerliContracts.name: <Name of Goerli contract 1 (remove entry in array if it doesn't apply, add more entries if there are more contracts)>
<Name of Goerli contract 2 (remove entry in array if it doesn't apply, add more entries if there are more contracts)>

audits.name: <Name of the publicly available Security Audit. Remove entry from 'audits' array if non-existent. Add more entries to the 'audits' array if relevant>
audits.url: URL to access the security audit. Only audits that are publicly available will be considered to be included in Dappland. If they're private, please don't include them in the 'audits' array>

links.website: <URL of the dapp's website. Leave empty if non-existent>
links.careers: <URL of the dapp's carreer page. Can also be 'mailto:example@mydapp.com'. Leave empty if non-existent>
links.twitter: <URL of the dapp's Twitter account>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.telegram: <URL of the dapp's Telegram>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.discord: <URL of the dapp's Discord invite>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.github: <URL of the dapp's Github>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.youtube: <URL of the dapp's Youtube channel>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.medium: <URL of the dapp's Medium>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.mirror: <URL of the dapp's Mirror page>. Leave empty if non-existent

teamInfo.founded: Founding date of the project. EXAMPLE: 2022-05-24T00:00:00.000Z

tokens.address: <Address of any ERC-20 Mainnet tokens created by the dapp>

nft.collectionContract: <Address of the NFT contract you wish to showcase>
nft.collectionLink: <https url for link to view full collection>

media.videoUrl: <URL for a video of the dapp (hosted externally)>

gallery.url: <URL for a promotional image or screenshots of the dapp (hosted externally) Resolution: at least 700 × 400. Add more entries to the 'gallery' array if necessary>
